definition: to drift through life
if/supposing/careless/negligent/temporarily
surname Gou
to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive
to drift and live without purpose (idiom); to drag out an ignoble existence
remaining breath/last gasp
to struggle on whilst at death's door (idiom)
to live without purpose
to bear humiliation to save one's skin (idiom)
survival/the struggle to eke out a living/to seek for continued existence
see 苟且偷安[gou3 qie3 tou1 an1]
seeking only ease and comfort (idiom); making no attempt to improve oneself/taking things easily without attending to responsibilities
content to hold a small part of the territory/fig. forced to relinquish the middle ground/forced to move away
to shirk responsibility/thoughtless pleasure-seeking
to bear shame and humiliation (idiom)
to rely on others for the air one breathes (idiom); to depend on sb's whim for one's living
at dawn, not sure of lasting to evening (idiom); precarious state/imminent crisis/living from hand to mouth
to rely on sb for protection
to stand a siege/trapped in a besieged city
to sink into oblivion/to be lost to memory/to vanish
